products.name: Cantaros de Miel
products.title: Blanco
products.description: Porque somos más jaliscienses que las tortas ahogadas

products.name: Cantaros de Miel
products.title: Joven
products.description: Porque somos más jaliscienses que las tortas ahogadas
products.aroma: Citrus with a slight oak smell
products.sabor: White Oak, toasted almonds and a light touch of chocolate and vanilla.

products.name: Chulavista
products.title: Blanco
products.description: Porque somos más jaliscienses que las tortas ahogadas
products.color: Silver colored, brilliant, clear and transparent with bluish reflections.
products.aroma: Herbal, citric and spiced dry sweet fruits
products.cuerpo: Medium bodied with medium light drainage in legs.
products.sabor: Spiced with a light touch of cinnamon and a citric blossom.

products.name: Chulavista
products.title: Reposado
products.description: Porque somos más jaliscienses que las tortas ahogadas
products.color: Amber colored, brilliant, clear and transparent with golden sunshine reflections.
products.aroma: White Oak, toasted almonds and a light cinnamon-vanilla touch.
products.cuerpo: Full bodied with strong drainage in legs.
products.sabor: White Oak, toasted almonds and a light touch of chocolate and vanilla.

products.name: La Tarea
products.title: Blanco
products.description: No solo es un clásico es un 100%
products.aroma: Floral, Fruity and Herbal with Light Citrus Notes.
products.cuerpo: Full-bodied tequila with strong drainage in legs.
products.sabor: Big agave notes with Citrus and fruit taste on the palet.

products.name: La Tarea
products.title: Reposado
products.description: No solo es un clásico es un 100%
products.aroma: Scents of caramel, agave, honey and white pepper
products.cuerpo: Full-bodied tequila with strong drainage in legs.
products.sabor: Spicy and sweet at the same time, touches of earthy agave, hints of vanilla and honey caramel sweetness.

products.name: El Pial
products.title: Reposado
products.color: Amber colored brilliant, clear and transparent with copper reflections.
products.aroma: Sweet caramel, vanilla with a touch of dried ripe fruits.
products.cuerpo: Full body with strong drainage in legs.
products.sabor: Soft dried fruits, vanilla and a light touch of chocolate.

products.name: Don Anselmo
products.title: Blanco
products.color: Brilliant, transparent with white - bluish reflections and silver nuance.
products.aroma: The predominance is citric orange blossom aromas combined with  herbal notes, also can be find the sweetness from cooked agave.
products.cuerpo: Medium to full-bodied tequila with slow drainage of “tears” or “legs”.
products.sabor:
The sweetness of the caramel, obtained during the cooking of the agave, is confirmed. The alcoholic impact is low and very pleasant.
This tequila has a rich mixture of herbal and the acidity of the citric orange blossom.

products.name: Don Anselmo
products.title: Reposado
products.color: Intense straw-colored, brilliant, clear and transparent with golden reflections.
products.aroma: A low alcoholic impact,  the sweet aroma of caramel accompanied by dried and ripe fruits.
products.cuerpo: Medium to full-bodied tequila with slow drainage of “tears” or “legs”.
products.sabor: Caramel and a touch of chocolate are confirmed. Also can be find tastes as Vanilla, Oak and cooked agave.

products.name: Don Anselmo
products.title: Añejo
products.color: Amber colored, brilliant, clear and transparent with copper reflections.
products.aroma: A sweet aroma of caramel accompanied by toasted almonds, chocolate, vanilla and a light touch of sweet cooked agave.
products.cuerpo: Full-bodied tequila with long drainage in legs.
products.sabor: Soft dried fuits,  vanilla, and a light touch of chocolate.
